backend/main.mo: Actor implements access control, user approval, invite-only logic, user profiles, and match-related types with various query and update methods.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module returning old state as new state without changes.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of multiple frontend files across components, pages, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, light/dark mode palettes, and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the root element and main frontend script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React router configuration defining all routes and wrapping the app in ThemeProvider, AuthGate, and layout components.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaBallButto: Reusable button for APA balls showing state, styling, and accessibility labels with click handling.
frontend/src/components/apa/apaBallStyle: Defines ball state types, scoring values, labels, and utilities to compute rack totals.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaRackScori: Rack scoring UI managing ball states, innings, auto-dead logic, validation, and rack completion callbacks.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaResultsSu: Displays final match results with winner info, points, innings, defensive shots, and PPI.
frontend/src/components/apa/RealApaMatch: Form for creating or editing logged APA matches with validation, identity checks, and save/update mutations.
frontend/src/components/apa/useApaInning: Custom hook tracking active player, innings, and turn flow with helpers to update inning state.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Access control wrapper handling identity login, admin/approval checks, invite-only mode, and gated rendering.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button managing Internet Identity authentication and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for creating or editing a user profile with name and APA skill level selection.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout with header, navigation actions, outlet content, footer, and profile dialogs.
frontend/src/components/matches/DeleteMa: Button with confirmation dialog that deletes a match and navigates or triggers a callback.
frontend/src/components/matches/EndMatch: Dialog that confirms saving and ending a match session with async handling and error toasts.
frontend/src/components/matches/MatchSum: Card displaying match mode, date, and computed summary text with navigation to details.
frontend/src/components/navigation/ModeC: Card representing a game mode with icon, description, and a button navigating to start a match.
frontend/src/components/players/ApaAggre: Generates PPI and match result charts using computed series and rolling averages for a player.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to identity, auto-refreshing dependent queries when updated.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorRetry.ts: Provides a retry mechanism that clears and refetches the cached actor query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating match data and user profiles via the backend actor with timeout and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme CSS variables and base styling.
frontend/src/lib/accepting-gifts/accepti: Utility functions to update game state for the Accepting Gifts mode, including attempts, set progression, and ball count adjustments.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaAggregateStats.t: Extracts APA match stats, computes PPI, and aggregates outcomes for charting and win-rate calculations.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaEqualizer.ts: Defines APA skill levels, points-to-win mappings, and helpers for formatting and validating skill levels.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaMatchPoints.ts: Provides APA 9-ball match point conversion tables and outcome thresholds based on loser points.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaScoring.ts: Implements scoring logic for APA 9-ball racks, including point validation, PPI calculation, and per-player stat aggregation.
Determines official APA match outcomes using skill levels and scores, with fallback derivation logic when didWin is absent.
frontend/src/lib/apa/officialApaPpi.ts: Calculates official APA PPI from string inputs with validation and formatting support.
frontend/src/lib/matches/effectiveMatchD: Parses date strings for APA matches and returns a reliable timestamp, preferring official log dates over dateTime, and formats them for display.
frontend/src/lib/matches/matchBuilders.t: Builds official APA match log records with derived win/loss outcome and re-exports other match builders.
frontend/src/lib/matches/matchBuildersOr: Defines builders for APA 9-ball, Accepting Gifts, and other match types, constructing MatchLogRecord objects with stats and metadata.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/accepting-gifts/Accep: Manages the Accepting Gifts drill gameplay loop, session persistence, scoring, and match saving.
Displays the rules, scoring, and progression overview for the Accepting Gifts drill.
Provides the setup form for starting an Accepting Gifts session, including baseline selection and session initialization.
Handles APA practice match flow, loading/saving game state, updating rack results, and marking match completion.
frontend/src/pages/apa/PracticeStartPage: Collects player names and skill levels to initialize a new APA practice match and stores the game state to sessionStorage.
frontend/src/pages/apa/RealApaMatchEditP: Loads an existing official APA match and renders a form to edit its data, redirecting if not found.
frontend/src/pages/apa/RealApaMatchPlace: Displays a form for creating a new official APA match log entered after the fact.
frontend/src/pages/auth/AccessNotAllowed: Shows an invite-only access warning and lets users submit an approval request.
frontend/src/pages/history/MatchDetailsP: Displays detailed information for a specific match, including APA-specific stats and outcomes.
frontend/src/pages/history/MatchHistoryP: Lists all past matches with filtering, sorting, and navigation to details.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the home screen with navigation cards for all match modes and a link to match history.
frontend/src/pages/owner/OwnerApprovalsP: Admin page listing pending, approved, and rejected user approvals with actions to approve, reject, toggle invite-only mode, and reject all pending users.
frontend/src/pages/players/PlayerAggrega: Displays aggregate APA stats for a selected player, computing win rates, averages, and rendering charts and summary cards.
frontend/src/pages/straight-shot/Straigh: Runs the Straight Shot drill session, tracks strokes and events, persists state, and saves the completed match to the backend.
Shows the rules and instructions for the Straight Shot strokes drill.
Start page for creating a new Straight Shot session, capturing player info and showing recent moving‑average performance.
frontend/src/utils/errorText.ts: Converts unknown error objects into readable strings, handling nested and serialized errors safely.
frontend/src/utils/playerName.ts: Normalizes and compares player names case‑insensitively and checks membership against a list.
frontend/src/utils/playerRoutes.ts: Builds the route path for a player's aggregate stats page.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, with fallback to sessionStorage and hash‑based routing support.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Provides a helper that wraps a promise with a timeout using Promise.race and rejects with a custom error if exceeded.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata detailing version, app summary, architectural notes, and known issues for an APA pool practice scorekeeper.
